src:
Berikut Daftar 86 Voters untuk KLB PSSI
01 Nov 2019, 22:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tinggal beberapa jam lagi Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI untuk menentukan pengurus baru periode 2019-2023 akan digelar. Kongres tersebut bakal berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Total, ada 86 voters atau pemegang hak suara di KLB tersebut. Dengan rincian, 18 klub Liga 1, 16 klub Liga 2, 16 klub Liga 3, 34 asosiasi provinsi (asprov), satu asosiasi futsal, dan satu asosiasi sepak bola wanita.
“Untuk total voters, jumlahnya 86. Sama seperti Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI di Ancol, Jakarta Utara, 27 Juli lalu,” ujar Ketua Pemilihan (KP) PSSI, Syarif Bastaman di Kantor KapanLagi Youniverse (KLY), Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Nantinya, setiap voter berhak menyalurkan hak suaranya sebanyak 14 kali. Setiap pemilik suara akan memilih satu calon ketua umum (caketum), dua calon wakil ketua umum (cawaketum), dan 12 calon anggota komite eksekutif (exco).
Adapun untuk posisi ketum, ada 11 nama yang akan bersaing. Sementara untuk waketum ada 15 orang, dan untuk anggota exco 71 orang.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Here is a list of 86 Voters for PSB KLB
Nov 01 2019, 22:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI's Extraordinary Congress (KLB) is only a few hours away to determine the new management for the 2019-2023 period to be held. The congress will take place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
In total, there were 86 voters or voting rights holders in the KLB. With details, 18 League 1 clubs, 16 League 2 clubs, 16 League 3 clubs, 34 provincial associations (asprov), one futsal association, and one women's soccer association.
"For total voters, there are 86. Same as the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) in Ancol, North Jakarta, July 27," said PSSI Election Chair (KP), Syarif Bastaman at the KapanLagi Youniverse (KLY) Office, Jakarta, Friday (Friday) 11/1/2019).
Later, each voter has the right to distribute his vote as much as 14 times. Each voting owner will elect one candidate for general chairman (caketum), two candidates for vice chairman (cawaketum), and 12 candidates for executive committee members (exco).
As for the position of Ketum, there are 11 names that will compete. While for Waketum there are 15 people, and for EXCO members 71 people.

Read the next page, Bolaneters
